SEARCH
Package com.aleatest.pokemonapi.config

Class HttpClientConfig

java.lang.Object
com.aleatest.pokemonapi.config.HttpClientConfig
@Configuration public class HttpClientConfig extends Object
Configuration class that defines the HTTP client used to call the Poke API. Provides a pre-configured RestTemplate bean with default headers set to accept JSON responses.
